When struck in combat has a chance of shielding the wearer in a protective shield which will absorb 350 damage.
(8) Set:
+8 All Resistances.

Robes of Prophecy
Vambraces of Prophecy
(3) Set:
-100 sec to the casting time of your Flash Heal spell.
(5) Set:
Improves your chance to get a critical strike with Holy spells by 2%.
(8) Set:
Increases your chance of a critical hit with Prayer of Healing by 25%.

Pauldrons of Transcendence
Robes of Transcendence

Allows 15% of your Mana regeneration to continue while casting.
(5) Set:
When struck in melee there is a 50% chance you will Fade for 4 sec.
(8) Set:
Your Greater Heals now have a heal over time component equivalent to a rank 5 Renew.

Increases healing done by spells and effects by up to 13.
Vestments of Transcendence
(0/8)
Belt of Transcendence
Bindings of Transcendence
Boots of Transcendence
Halo of Transcendence
Handguards of Transcendence
Leggings of Transcendence
Pauldrons of Transcendence
Robes of Transcendence
(3) Set:
Allows 15% of your Mana regeneration to continue while casting.
(5) Set:
When struck in melee there is a 50% chance you will Fade for 4 sec.
(8) Set:
Your Greater Heals now have a heal over time component equivalent to a rank 5 Renew.

Frostfire Belt
Frostfire Bindings
Frostfire Circlet
Frostfire Gloves
Frostfire Leggings
Frostfire Robe
Frostfire Sandals
Frostfire Shoulderpads
Frostfire Ring
(2) Set:
Reduces cooldown on your Evocation by 60000 minute.
(4) Set:
Gives your Mage Armor a chance when struck by a harmful spell to increase resistance against that school of magic by 35 for 30 sec.
(6) Set:
Your damage spells have a chance to cause your target to take up to 200 increased damage from subsequent spells.
(8) Set:
Your damage spells have a chance to displace you, causing the next spell cast to generate no threat.

Your damage spells have a chance to displace you, causing the next spell cast to generate no threat.

(5) Set:
Your critical strikes with damaging Arcane spells increase your casting speed by 5% for 6 sec.
(8) Set:
Arcane Surge increases the damage of your spells and effects by up to 40 for 8 sec.

Item #47099
URL: https://database.turtle-wow.org/?item=47099
Category: Database/Items/Armor/Cloth
Item: 
Frostfire Crown
Binds when picked up
Unique
Head
Cloth
108 Armor
+12 Stamina
+21 Intellect
+23 Spirit
Durability 60 / 60
Classes: Mage
Requires Level 60
Equip:
Improves your chance to get a critical strike with spells by 2%.
Equip:
Increases damage done by Arcane spells and effects by up to 40.
Equip:
Decreases the magical resistances of your spell targets by 10.
Frostfire Vestments
(0/9)
Frostfire Crown
Frostfire Epaulets
Frostfire Vestments
Frostfire Bracers
Frostfire Handwraps
Frostfire Cord
Frostfire Trousers
Frostfire Slippers
Frostfire Signet
(2) Set:
When your Mana Shield is broken, it erupts violently, dealing Arcane damage equal to 20% of the absorbed damage to all targets within 8 yards.
(4) Set:
Your Arcane Rupture and Arcane Surge critical strikes displace enemies within 8 yards of the target, reducing all their resistances by 25 for 8 sec.
(6) Set:
While Arcane Power is active, your Arcane spell critical strikes restore 3% of your maximum mana.
(8) Set:
Whenever your damaging Arcane spells are partially or fully resisted, the damage of your next direct spell cast within 6 sec is increased by 10%.

Item: 
Crown of the Guardian
Binds when picked up
Unique
Head
Cloth
112 Armor
+24 Stamina
+26 Intellect
Durability 60 / 60
Classes: Mage
Requires Level 60
Equip:
Increases damage and healing done by magical spells and effects by up to 46.
Equip:
Improves your chance to hit with spells by 2%.

Improves your chance to get a critical strike with spells by 1%.
Regalia of the Guardian
(0/6)
Crown of the Guardian
Mantle of the Guardian
Robes of the Guardian
Leggings of the Guardian
Boots of the Guardian
Pendant of the Guardian
(3) Set:
Initial hits from Flamestrike, Cone of Cold, Frost Nova, Blast Wave, and Arcane Explosion have a chance to trigger a rewind effect, dealing an additional 20% damage.
(5) Set:
Your spell critical strikes conjure a magical barrier that absorbs 350 damage. While the barrier holds, the damage you deal with magical spells and effects is increased by up to 42 and the threat you generate is reduced by 15%.

Item #47117
URL: https://database.turtle-wow.org/?item=47117
Category: Database/Items/Armor/Cloth
Item: 
Trousers of the Guardian
Binds when picked up
Unique
Legs
Cloth
121 Armor
+20 Stamina
+24 Intellect
+27 Spirit
Durability 75 / 75
Classes: Mage
Requires Level 60
Equip:
Increases your attack and casting speed by 2%.
Equip:
Improves your chance to get a critical strike with spells by 1%.
Equip:
Increases damage done by Arcane spells and effects by up to 43.
Vestments of the Guardian
(0/6)
Circlet of the Guardian
Epaulets of the Guardian
Vestments of the Guardian
Trousers of the Guardian
Slippers of the Guardian
Amulet of the Guardian
(3) Set:
Increases the chance for Resonance Cascade to trigger by 5%.
(5) Set:
Reduce the mana cost of your spells by 100% for 6 sec after Presence of Mind is consumed.

Item #47198
URL: https://database.turtle-wow.org/?item=47198
Category: Database/Items/Armor/Cloth
Item: 
Coronet of Prophecy
Binds when picked up
Unique
Head
Cloth
83 Armor
+16 Stamina
+18 Intellect
+13 Spirit
+10 Fire Resistance
Durability 60 / 60
Classes: Priest
Requires Level 60
Equip:
Increases damage done by Shadow spells and effects by up to 36.
Regalia of Prophecy
(0/8)
Coronet of Prophecy
Shoulderpads of Prophecy
Raiments of Prophecy
Bracers of Prophecy
Handguards of Prophecy
Sash of Prophecy
Pants of Prophecy
Sandals of Prophecy
(3) Set:
Your Shadow spells generate 15% less threat.
(5) Set:
Increases the duration of Mind Flay by 1000 secs.
(8) Set:
Damage from your Shadow spells has a 10% chance to cause an Epiphany, increasing damage done by Shadow spells and effects by up to 45 for 10 sec. This effect can only trigger once every 10 sec.

Item #47206
URL: https://database.turtle-wow.org/?item=47206
Category: Database/Items/Armor/Cloth
Item: 
Coronet of Transcendence
Binds when picked up
Unique
Head
Cloth
94 Armor
+18 Stamina
+22 Intellect
+13 Spirit
+10 Fire Resistance
+10 Frost Resistance
Durability 60 / 60
Classes: Priest
Requires Level 60
Equip:
Improves your chance to get a critical strike with spells by 1%.
Equip:
Increases damage done by Shadow spells and effects by up to 36.
Regalia of Transcendence
(0/8)
Coronet of Transcendence
Shoulderpads of Transcendence
Raiments of Transcendence
Bracers of Transcendence
Handguards of Transcendence
Sash of Transcendence
Pants of Transcendence
Sandals of Transcendence
(3) Set:
Increases damage done by your Mana Burn by 30%.
(5) Set:
Increases the duration of your Vampiric Embrace by 20000 sec.
(8) Set:
Your Shadow Word: Pain has a 8% chance to increase the critical strike chance of your Mind Blast by 10%. This effect is expended when your Mind Blast critically strikes an enemy.

Tiara of the Oracle
Binds when picked up
Unique
Head
Cloth
150 Armor
+21 Stamina
+26 Intellect
+24 Spirit
Durability 60 / 60
Classes: Priest
Requires Level 60
Equip:

Vestments of the Oracle
(0/5)
Tiara of the Oracle
Spaulders of the Oracle
Vestments of the Oracle
Trousers of the Oracle
Treads of the Oracle
(3) Set:
Lightwell reduces damage taken by 4% while under its effect.
(5) Set:
Increases the number of charges on your Lightwell by 3 and the healing you receive by 6% while under its effect.

Item #47220
URL: https://database.turtle-wow.org/?item=47220
Category: Database/Items/Armor/Cloth
Item: 
Shoulderpads of Faith
Binds when picked up
Unique
Shoulder
Cloth
97 Armor
+17 Stamina
+21 Intellect
Durability 60 / 60
Classes: Priest
Requires Level 60
Equip:
Improves your chance to get a critical strike with spells by 1%.
Equip:
Increases damage and healing done by magical spells and effects by up to 29.
Regalia of Faith
(0/9)
Coronet of Faith
Shoulderpads of Faith
Raiments of Faith
Bracers of Faith
Handguards of Faith
Sash of Faith
Pants of Faith
Sandals of Faith
Ring of Faith
(2) Set:
Reduces the chance your Mind Control will be resisted by 3%.
(4) Set:
When your Mind Blast critically strikes a target its cooldown is reduced by 2000 sec.
(6) Set:
Mind Flay has a 10% chance to deal additional damage equal to 3000 sec. of your Shadow Word: Pain if the effect is active on your target.
(8) Set:
Damage from your Shadow spells has 8% a chance to grant your party a vampiric aura for 6 sec, returning 5% of their damage as healing.  This effect can only trigger once every 10 sec.

Mind Flay has a 10% chance to deal additional damage equal to 3000 sec. of your Shadow Word: Pain if the effect is active on your target.
(8) Set:
Damage from your Shadow spells has 8% a chance to grant your party a vampiric aura for 6 sec, returning 5% of their damage as healing.  This effect can only trigger once every 10 sec.

Increases damage and healing done by magical spells and effects by up to 27.
Nemesis Attire
(0/8)
Nemesis Crown
Nemesis Mantle
Nemesis Raiments
Nemesis Bindings
Nemesis Handwraps
Nemesis Sash
Nemesis Leggings
Nemesis Slippers
(3) Set:
Increases the range of Drain Life, Drain Mana and Drain Soul spells by 10%.
(5) Set:
Increases the duration of Corruption and Siphon Life spells by 3000 sec.
(8) Set:
Damage from your Drain Soul has a chance to increase the damage of your next Corruption spell by 15%.

Item #47300

Category: Database/Items/Armor/Cloth
Item: 
Plagueheart Bindings
Binds when picked up
Unique
Wrist
Cloth
58 Armor
+23 Intellect
+14 Stamina
Durability 35 / 35
Classes: Warlock
Requires Level 60
Equip:
Increases damage and healing done by magical spells and effects by up to 23.
Plagueheart Attire
(0/9)
Plagueheart Crown
Plagueheart Mantle
Plagueheart Raiments
Plagueheart Bindings
Plagueheart Handwraps
Plagueheart Sash
Plagueheart Leggings
Plagueheart Boots
Plagueheart Signet
(2) Set:
Whenever you use Life Tap, the mana cost of your next spell cast within 10 sec is reduced by 10%.
(4) Set:
Your Curse of Agony will instantly deal damage to the target for 1 tick upon application.
(6) Set:
Reduces the cooldown of your Dark Harvest by 5000 sec.
(8) Set:
The periodic damage of your Corruption has a chance to inflict the enemy with a devastating plague, increasing their chance to be critically struck by spells by 2% and draining 240 health over 6 sec.

Equip:
Improves your chance to hit with spells by 1%.
Equip:
Increases damage and healing done by magical spells and effects by up to 35.
Nathrezim Raiment
(0/6)
Nathrezim Skullcap
Nathrezim Spaulders
Nathrezim Robes
Nathrezim Pants
Nathrezim Slippers
Nathrezim Pendant
(3) Set:
Increases the critical strike damage bonus of your Shadow Bolt and Searing Pain spells by 10% and the critical strike damage bonus of your controlled demon's attacks, abilities and spells by 10%.
(5) Set:
Dealing direct Shadow and Fire damage has a chance to coat the enemy in Felfire, dealing 45 Shadow and 45 Fire damage every second for 6 sec.  While burning, Shadow and Fire damage taken is increased by 3%.

Head
Cloth
47 Armor

Stormreaver Attire
(0/6)
Stormreaver Belt
Stormreaver Gloves
Stormreaver Mantle
Stormreaver Hood
Stormreaver Robe
Stormreaver Boots
(2) Set:
Improves your chance to hit with spells by 1%.
(4) Set:
Increases damage and healing done by magical spells and effects by up to 18.
(6) Set:
Your landing damaging spells have a 5% chance to curse the enemy with Impending Doom, which arrives after 5 sec and deals 103 to 133 Shadow damage. Dealing Shadow damage to the target causes the Doom to arrive instantly and deal 20% more damage.
